entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
